channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: NTSB urges ban on some helicopter flights at Washington airport where 67 people died in midair crash
item.description: Federal investigators looking for the cause of the January collision between a passenger jet and an Army helicopter near Washington, D.C., that killed 67 people are recommending a ban on some helicopter flights.

item.title: What is known about the deadly January air crash between a passenger jet and US Army helicopter
Mahmoud Khalil didn’t wear a mask. He’s now the face of Trump’s crackdown on campus protests
